thread.title: Science-Fiction Writer Ursula K. Le Guin Dies at 88

author: wsjcom
title: Science-Fiction Writer Ursula K. Le Guin Dies at 88
text:
PORTLAND, Ore.—Ursula K. Le Guin, the award-winning science fiction and fantasy writer who explored feminist themes and was best known for her Earthsea books, has died at 88.
Ms. Le Guin died suddenly and peacefully Monday at her home in Portland, Ore., after several weeks of health concerns, her son, Theo Downes-Le Guin said Tuesday.
